trans-unit.source: Generates views for the extents in the <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>, and creates a source code file for a type that will cache these views.
trans-unit.target: 生成视图中的范围<xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>，并创建一种类型，将缓存这些视图的源的代码文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityViewGenerator"></xref> class with a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> language option.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityViewGenerator"></xref>类，该类具有<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>语言选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityViewGenerator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityViewGenerator"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> values that specifies the language of the generated code.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>指定生成的代码的语言的值。

trans-unit.source: The default language is C#.
trans-unit.target: 默认语言为 C#。

trans-unit.source: Generates views at compile time for the extents in a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在中的范围的编译时生成视图<xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sends a source code file to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to make these views available at run time.
trans-unit.target: 将发送到一个源代码文件<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>以使这些视图在运行时可用。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> from which views will be generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>从生成的视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which the generated code will be sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>生成的代码将发送至此。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: A list that contains any generated errors.
trans-unit.target: 列表包含任何生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Generates views at compile time for the extents in a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在中的范围的编译时生成视图<xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes a source code file to a specified location that makes the views available at run time.
trans-unit.target: 将写入指定的位置，使视图在运行时可用的源代码文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> from which views will be generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>从生成的视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> that specifies the location to which the source code file will be written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>，它指定源代码文件将写入的位置。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A list that contains any generated errors.
trans-unit.target: 列表包含任何生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Generates views at compile time for the extents in a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在中的范围的编译时生成视图<xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sends a source code file to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to make these views available at run time.
trans-unit.target: 将发送到一个源代码文件<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>以使这些视图在运行时可用。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which the output is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>向其中写入输出。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref>相对应的实体框架的目标版本。

trans-unit.source: A list that contains any generated errors.
trans-unit.target: 列表包含任何生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> value that indicates the language of the generated code.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>值，该值指示生成的代码的语言。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Validates a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 验证<xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>进行验证。

trans-unit.source: A list that contains any generated errors.
trans-unit.target: 列表包含任何生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Validates a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 验证<xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"> </xref>进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref>相对应的实体框架的目标版本。
